description.p: Elwood Terminal is a GPU-accelerated terminal emulator with a built-in AI coding agent, forked from WezTerm. It features font ligatures, hyperlinks, multiple windows, tabs and split panes.
Configuration is expressed using Lua and many powerful functions are provided to help you customize your terminal to your workflow.

Integrated ssh allows using multiple tabs and panes without requiring tmux to be installed on the remote host, and remote multiplexer support allows tmux+mosh style workflows without using tmux or mosh, while providing a fully native GUI locally.
Initial release of Elwood Terminal, featuring an integrated AI coding agent, Tokyo Night default theme, and GPU-accelerated rendering via WezTerm's rendering engine.
